exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment P : Z -> Set p : nat H1 : forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n H2 : and_recZ p P n : nat H3 : S n <= S p Unable to unify "P ?M1382" with "and_set_set_set (P (pos (S n))) (P (neg (S n)))".

In environment P : Z -> Set p : nat H1 : forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n H2 : and_recZ p P n : nat H3 : S n <= S p Unable to unify "S n <= S p" with "and_set_set_set (P (pos (S n))) (P (neg (S n)))".

original: intros P p H1 H2. unfold and_recZ. intros n H3. destruct n. - apply H2. - apply H1. apply H3.
